mdRecord.dcterms:title: De Telegraaf Office building, exterior|general view
Kantoorgebouw De Telegraaf
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Langhout, G. J. (Gerard) (Dutch architect, 1879-1962) [work]
Staal, Jan Frederik (Dutch architect, 1879-1940) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This former office building/printers' works slots into an awkward site making full use of its surface area. Staal, who was mainly occupied with designing the facades, accentuated the transition from old to new with visually distinct volumes, scaling the arrangement of windows in the taut facade to the size and proportions of the surrounding houses. The tower is decorated with sculpture by Hildo Krop. -- http://www.architectureguide.nl/project/list_projects_of_architect/arc_id/208/prj_id/335 [work]
